name: Zero G Arena
description: Zero G Arena is an arena shooter with zero gravity, ragdoll physics, grappling beams and magnet boots
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later (64 bit only) Processor: i3-2120 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD6670 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum download speed of 0.35Mb/s and upload of 0.075Mb/s is required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
